Header: 4 VIR Troops in Jaffna Clean Chavakachcheri Hospital Precincts
Content: Troops of the 4 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) in the 523 Brigade of the 52 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) on Saturday (7) took part in a community project to clean the Chavakachcheri Base Hospital precincts at the request of medical authorities. Those troops taking more than five hours cleaned the premises and received commendation from Hospital authorities.
